resources.string:
Place your hand flat on the table. 


On the green 'go' signal, grasp the block and place it on the top of the shelf. 


Return your hand to the table.

Place your hand flat on the table. 


On the green 'go' signal, grasp the block and place it on the top of the shelf. 


Return your hand to the table.

On the green 'go' signal, grasp the block and place it on the top of the shelf. 


Return your hand to the table.

On the green 'go' signal, grasp the block and place it on the top of the shelf. 


Return your hand to the table.
